executable.title: Metric Exploration
executable.description: Explores the values of the similarity metric for the given two images. The reult is a table that contains the value of the metric for the combination of the parameters. The input of this tool is the location in space around which the metric should be explored, the type of the metric, the direction of the exploration, and the type of the parameter to be explored (in the future, possibly the type of the transformation to be explored).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.
